name: Atlantic Union Bankshares Corporation
description: Atlantic Union Bankshares Corporation is a bank holding company based in Virginia, primarily focused on providing a comprehensive range of financial services to individuals and businesses. Established in 1902, the company has evolved significantly, expanding its operations to become one of the largest community banks in the region. Atlantic Union Bank offers various banking products, including personal and business banking, mortgage services, and wealth management solutions. The bank prides itself on its commitment to customer service and community involvement, striving to build lasting relationships with its clients while contributing to the economic growth of the communities it serves. With a strong emphasis on digital banking solutions, Atlantic Union Bank is dedicated to enhancing customer experience through innovative technology and personalized service. The company's mission is to empower its customers to achieve their financial goals while fostering a culture of integrity, teamwork, and excellence.
